title: Build Your Quit Plan
description: These questions help you understand yourself and create motivation for your quit journey.

cigarettesPerDay.label: How many cigarettes do you smoke per day?

yearsSmoking.label: How many years have you been smoking?

startAge.label: At what age did you start smoking?

quitAttempts.label: How many times have you tried to quit?

familySmoker.label: Does anyone in your family smoke?

relatedDisease.label: Do you have any smoking-related diseases?

motivation.label: What is your biggest reason for quitting?

trigger.label: What triggers or times make you crave cigarettes?

strategy.label: What will you do when you crave a cigarette?
strategy.sub: e.g., Drink water, walk, call a friend...

quitDate.label: What date do you want to quit?
